tag_list: socialmedia, ceo, executive, seo, website-design, website-development, tucson, arizona, social-media-marketing, new-media-marketing, content-creation, online-reputation-management, search-engine-optimization, business-analysis, consulting
overview:
Ryan Flannagan is the CEO of Nuanced Media which specializes in Social Media Marketing, Website Development, New Media Marketing, Content Creation, Online Reputation Management, Search Engine Optimization, Business Analysis and Consulting.

Ryan is an accomplished and talented Executive with a wealth of experience and expertise in building both product and business from the ground up. Extensive expertise in analysis of business strategy and positioning, documentation, and presentation of materials. Demonstrative experience and startup success in the social media arena developing elemental software such as Geekvolution, TweetNewz, and TweetMarchMadness. Professional trainer and team developer. Outstanding ability to develop powerful strategic community and business relationships combined with strong market analysis and marketing acumen. Seasoned project manager who has consistently delivered complex technology projects with zero defect and time-critical compliance.
